column4: If Dame Pesos and Sam Hyde started a podcast...

1 full hour of conversations being started, before immediately being broken off by insane laughter, no complete sentences, long breakdowns of both hosts laughing *at their own thoughts*.Unironically 10/10 best podcast ever conceived.EDIT: Please continue to post on my threads after I've blocked you, it really fuels my ego knowing I have dedicated haters out there wasting time posting on my threads *knowing I will never see them.* I know I've effected your lives in some small way by making you throw irrational tantrums on the internet. It means something to know I was able to have such a lasting emotional effect on you all, so sincerely, *thank you for being upset*. It really makes me feel good.
